solution_line_template: First find the total number of donuts Jean eats: {total_pages_written} pages / {pages_per_donut} pages/donut = <<{total_pages_written}/{pages_per_donut}={total_donuts}>>{total_donuts} donuts

Then multiply that number by the number of calories per donut to find the total number of calories she eats: {total_donuts} donuts * {calories_per_donut} calories/donut = <<{total_donuts}*{calories_per_donut}={total_calories}>>{total_calories} calories
